name: Finding Users for Your Project
description: Launching a successful open source project involves more than just code. Start your journey here.
author: GitHub
inLanguage: English, Persian/Farsi, French/Français, Chinese (Traditional)/繁體中文, Chinese (Simplified) / 简体中文, Spanish/Español, Turkish/Türkçe, Greek/Ελληνικά, Tamil/தமிழ், German/Deutsch, Swahili, Bengali/Bangla, Russian/Русский, Bulgarian/Български, Romanian, Portuguese, Polish, Nigerian Pidgin, Dutch, Malay, Korean/한국어, Japanese/日本語, Italian, Indonesian, Hungarian/Magyar, Hindi
abstract: This guide explores strategies to attract and grow a user base for your open source project. It covers techniques such as improving discoverability, engaging with communities, and leveraging social platforms for outreach.
mentions: These guides are available in over 20 languages.
